nodes.text: Imperial Landing Facility 99-D was a Galactic Empire facility located on the planet Tatooine. When attempting to visit Tatooine in the Millennium Falcon to rescue Han Solo, Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca were surrounded by Imperial TIE fighters, who ordered them to be escorted to Imperial Landing Facility 99-D. However, a number of other starships attacked the TIE fighters, saving the Falcon.
